item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:-209 Chances: The ride-sharing application is up 85% in the last year. Lyft has a strong presence in the online social rideshare community platform. Risks: Uber and Lyft are threatening to end service in Minneapolis-St. Paul due to a city council decision to mandate minimum wage for drivers, which could impact their operations and financials.
